page.title: 04RELIGION
page.content: The church of St.Michael & All Angels is the focus of Anglican worship & is situated on the Foulridge side of Lake Burwain.The incumbant is the Rev.Roy McClure,an Ulsterman.The churchwardens are Mr.J.Wilkinson & Miss M.Fletcher.Sunday Services are usually 8am,10.45am & 3pm.For a large part the ASB service book is used. During June & July 1985,average weekly collections were Â£133.81. Attached to the church are the following societies:Scramblers, Climbers and Explorers,Pathfinders, Cyfa,Mothers Union,CMS,Brownies, Guides,Cubs & Scouts. Strong links are maintained with the CofE junior school of the same name. A need to raise Â£16000 for urgent structural repairs is the only black cloud on the horizon.
